server_type.description: The type of Server for this Pool.

action.description:
Please Choose the Action to Perform on this Profile:
* Deploy - will deploy the profile.
* No-op - will not deploy the profile.
* Unassign - will detach the profile from the hardware.

rack_pools.description: List of Rackmount Pools to Remove.

deployType.description:
* This Wizard Can Deploy to Intersight or Build Terraform Configuration Files
  for IaC Management.  Which Deployment Type you would like to utilize?

mainMenu.description: Select the Deployment type you would like to do with the wizard:
enum: Quick Start Deployment - Domain - VMware M2
Quick Start Deployment - Domain - VMware Raid1
Quick Start Deployment - Domain - VMware Stateless
mainMenu.default: Quick Start Deployment - Domain - VMware M2
